verbs.description: [ARG0: Most people] [V: celebrate] [ARG1: Mother ’s Day] [ARGM-MNR: by doing something special for their mom] . But billionaire liberal donor Tom Steyer marked the holiday with political ad full of bigoted caricatures of Trump supporters and Republicans .

[ARG0: Most people] celebrate Mother ’s Day by [V: doing] [ARG1: something special] [ARG2: for their mom] . But billionaire liberal donor Tom Steyer marked the holiday with political ad full of bigoted caricatures of Trump supporters and Republicans .
